description: The type of application made to court for judicial decision. Taken from reference data

applicationCode.description: The CJS Code for the court application type

applicationType.description: The CJS Title for the court application type

applicationCategory.description: The classification of the court application type

isBreachApplication.description: Identifies the application as relating to breach proceedings

isApplicationToRecordCourtOfAppealDecisi.description: Identifies the application as relating to the recording of court of appeal decisions

linkType.description: Indicates if a type of application must be linked or must be standalone or can be either

applicationJurisdictionType.description: Indicates the jurisdiction that is required to consider the application

isTimeRestricted.description: Indicates that the application should be submitted to court within a restricted time period.  Out of time applications may be considered but will require the reasons for the late application to be captured.

applicationSummonsRecipientType.description: Indicates if a summons is required for the applicant or for each respondent.  If there is not a recipient type, a summons is not required.
